item.title: ServiceNow Scoped Applications
item.description: #ServiceNow application development notes# I am hesitant to characterize this as a ‘best practices’ post or a ‘developer's guide’ of any kind, because what I have come to believe after making use of application scope in ServiceNow for the last couple of years is that it is ultimately just another feature of the product. And as such there are many ‘right’ ways of taking advantage of application scopes for a project.
